comments:
Build ID: M200609270800

Steps To Reproduce:
1. download eclipse-SDK-3.2.1-linux-gtk and cdt-3.1.1-linux-gtk.x86, org.eclipse.cdt.testing-3.1.0 and eclipse-Automated-Tests-3.2.1.
2. copy cdt plugin into eclipse platform and copy cdt testing plugin into eclipse automated test.
3. modify test.xml, test.properties and add new target for cdt testing(such cdtcore,cdtui, cdtdebugui and cdttesting)
4. runtests -os linux -ws gtk -vm /opt/java/jdk1.6.0_02/bin/java |tee -a console.log

Test results are in the attachment. 
testProjectUpdate12_Update Failure File makefile does not match its benchmark. 

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: File makefile does not match its benchmark.

The case is only faild when using jdk1.6.0_02 but passed when using jdk1.5.0_12!


More information:

OS: RedHat Enterprise3 
JDK: jdk-6u2-linux-i586.bin
Hardware: HP XW8400
eclipse binary package:eclipse-SDK-3.2.1-linux-gtk
CDT automated tests binary: org.eclipse.cdt.testing-3.1.0
CDT binary package: cdt-3.1.1-linux-gtk.x86.zip
